text: Amalfi Airport is an airport serving the town of Amalfi, in the Antioquia Department of Colombia. The runway is east of the town, in the valley of the Porce River. Ridgelines lie within east and west of the runway. The Otu VOR- DME (Ident: OTU) is located east-northeast of the airport. ==See also== * * *Transport in Colombia *List of airports in Colombia ==References== ==External links== *OpenStreetMaps - Amalfi *OurAirports - Amalfi *FallingRain - Amalfi Airport * Category:Airports in Colombia Category:Colombia transport-related lists
title: Amalfi Airport (Colombia)
